segments.text: Hi . I want to get something nice for my niece .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I've never heard of a little girl that didn't love Barbie dolls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like that suggestion . Show me one , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go â€” Digital Barbie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my niece will love her ! How much for her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Barbie is our best seller . She's only $ 29.95 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Your niece will love this . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , but no . This will do it for now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: With the tax , your total is $ 32.42 . Would you like to charge it ?
segments.speaker: S2
